title: An idea for rank games
body: How about instead of allowing placement matches everyone just starts in bronze. This way we eliminate the trash tier in low silver because they wont be able to climb out of bronze eliminating them from the sub division of low silver. I climbed to silver only to find silver 5 and 4 are actually worse than higher bronze 2 or 1

replies.body:
>This way we eliminate the trash tier in low silver because they wont be able to climb out of bronze eliminating them from the sub division of low silver

That's not how match making works. Match making is based on hidden MMR and has nothing to do with your visible tier/LP. If someone is in Silver V and is worse than Bronze 2/3 they'll get matched up with Bronze 3 players or whatever even though their visible rank is Silver V.

It's more likely that you're misperceiving your own skill level and the skill level of your colleagues in Silver.
yeah true, and because of that you have b5 players in silver 5... and they trash talk bronzies when they are just as bad if not worse
